@SaraSoueidan @Wufoo To can get @Netlify to provide a back end for all of your forms. All posts to the forms can trigger notifications, are accessible via an API and can also trigger builds etc. Shout if you need any help but the docs are pretty good. https://t.co/a9pRUSKrUY
